episodes.title: Jouriku! Moeru Shima Punk Hazard
episodes.plot: The Straw Hats have arrived at a volcanic island that does not show on the New World Log Pose. Luffy in his enthusiasm votes to go to the island, though most of the crew were reluctant to go because of the sea of fire blocking their way.

episodes.title: Shakunetsu no Tatakai! Luffy Tai Kyodai Ryuu!
episodes.plot: Luffy and Zoro start fighting the dragon, which is shown to be able to speak and breathe fire.

episodes.title: Ichimi Souzen! Shougeki no Kubi dake Samurai Toujou!
episodes.plot: Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, and Robin are standing near the dead dragon that Zoro killed and Luffy is trying to pull out the man who is stuck in the dragon's body.

episodes.title: Kyougaku! Tsui ni Akasareru Shima no Himitsu
episodes.plot: Franky, Sanji, Nami and Chopper are surprised that the samurai is still alive after being cut.

episodes.title: Kodomo-tachi o Sukue! Ichimi Sentou Kaishi
episodes.plot: Nami's group escaped the prison cell and end up in the Biscuits Room, where they find giant children.

episodes.title: Kenjutsu Shoubu: Brook Tai Nazo no Doutai Samurai
episodes.plot: At the lake, Luffy's group have been attacked by Brownbeard and his centaur unit who's job was to intercept and eliminate any obvious intruders.

episodes.title: Shichibukai! Trafalgar Law
episodes.plot: Chopper and Nami, leading the children stumble upon a room with people frozen in it. Franky, Sanji and the samurai start to make their way towards Nami and Chopper. Luffy, Zoro, Usopp and Robin get attacked by the centaurs.

episodes.title: Dai Pinch: Luffy Gokkan no Mizuumi ni Shizumu
episodes.plot: Luffy, Zoro, Usopp and Robin try to get to the ice side of Punk Hazard but their ship gets capsized by Brownbeard. As Brownbeard's troop prepares attack them again, Zoro gets ready to destroy their bullets but gets dragged down by sharks.

episodes.title: Gekitotsu! Law VS Smoker Chuujou
episodes.plot: Law was going to to cut up Tashigi into little pieces but Smoker saved her and started fighting against Law. Luffy, Zoro, Robin and Usopp are riding on top of Brownbeard after defeating him and his centaurs.

episodes.title: 2 Nenburi no Saikai! Luffy to Law
episodes.plot: Tashigi tries to see what happened in the fight. Luffy's group sees the flying warship. Luffy sees Law and thanks him for saving him two years ago. Law says that they aren't friends and Luffy agrees since they were both after One Piece.

episodes.title: Sekai Saiaku Kyoufu no Kagakusha Caesar
episodes.plot: The G-5 Marines discussed if Caesar Clown was probably behind the unusual events at the island and that the child abduction cases in that area may have been real.

episodes.title: Jijou Saikyou Colabo VS Umi no Taishokukan
episodes.plot: Featured characters of One Piece, Toriko, and Dragon Ball Z enter the IGO tournament in order to gain the Carat meat, which is said to be the most tasteful in the world. However, it leads in a tie between Goku, Toriko, and Luffy.

episodes.title: Chopper Gekido Master Hidounaru Jikken
episodes.plot: The children and the Straw Hat Pirates are in a cave with Brownbeard tied up talking about the Master. Zoro, Sanji and Brook go to look for Kin'emon, who had gone to look for his torso.

episodes.title: Ichimi Massatsu! Densetsu no Koroshiya Raishuu!
episodes.plot: Yeti Cool Brothers make their way to the destroyed lab where the Straw Hats and the children are. Monet tells Caesar Clown about Law having some relation to Luffy, which makes Caesar mistrust Law until Law reassures him.

episodes.title: Nami o Sukue! Luffy Yukiyama no Tatakai
episodes.plot: Chopper tells the others that Nami in Franky's body was kidnapped by the Yeti Cool Brothers. Franky in Chopper's body takes a Rumble Ball. Luffy and Franky go after the Yeti Cool Brothers to save Nami and defeat them.

episodes.title: Kessei! Luffy-Law Kaizoku Doumei!
episodes.plot: Luffy and Law agree on an alliance; the rest of the Straw Hat Pirates disapprove while Nico Robin approves, even if she warns Luffy about a possible betrayal in a pirate alliance.

episodes.title: Master o Toraero: Kaizoku Doumei Sakusen Kaishi!
episodes.plot: Zoro, Sanji and Brook are trying to find the samurai and remember what happened to them. They had been knocked out by the Yeti Cool Brothers, who used a gas that makes people drunk.

episodes.title: Zenmetsu no Kiki: Shi no Monster Hirai
episodes.plot: Luffy declares that he will capture Caesar. Law will distract Monet while Chopper finds an antidote for drug.

episodes.title: Dai-Gekisen: Caesar Shin no Nouryoku Hatsudou!
episodes.plot: Sanji, Kin'emon, Brook and Zoro see Smiley. Brook talks about a story of a creature called Slime which melts the clothes of women, making everyone act perverted except for Zoro, who points out that the slime is killing the fish in the lake.

episodes.title: Honoo Kirisaku Samurai! Kitsunebi no Kin'emon!
episodes.plot: Law's heart is crushed by the mysterious man named Vergo who was sent along with Monet to watch over Caesar.

episodes.title: Shougeki! Nazo no Otoko Vergo no Shoutai!
episodes.plot: Law gets beaten up by Vergo. Yarisugi tells the parents of the missing children that they are dead. Caesar takes the children from Usopp and Nami.

episodes.title: Kodomo-tachi o Mamore! Semaru Master no Ma no Te
episodes.plot: As Luffy and Law remain captives in Caesar's lab along with the others who were captured, Caesar Clown goes to retrieve the children from the remaining Straw Hat Pirates.

episodes.title: Shin Sekai Gekishin: Caesar Akumu no Jikken
episodes.plot: G-5 Marine soldiers try to break into the lab. Meanwhile, Mocha starts to doubt Caesar and his subordinates.

episodes.title: Shijou Saiaku no Satsuriku Heiki! Shinokuni
episodes.plot: Smiley eats the candy and begins its transformation, wreaking havoc on Punk Hazzard.

episodes.title: Hangeki Kaishi! Luffy-Law Daidasshutsu
episodes.plot: As the Underworld Brokers watch the video feed of the captive Straw Hats and Marines, Eustass Kid and Killer decided to ignore it for more important matters, such as forming alliances.

episodes.title: Mezase R-tou! Kaizoku Doumei Kaishingeki!
episodes.plot: Although they made it into the lab, the Straw Hat Pirates left a large hole in the side of it, allowing Shinokuni to spread.

episodes.title: Tashigi no Namida: G-5 Kesshi no Toppa Sakusen
episodes.plot: Caesar Clown orders the passage between building A and B to be closed, allowing Shinokuni to kill the intruders.

episodes.title: Uragiri no Chuujou! Kichiku no Vergo
episodes.plot: After getting through the gates and thinking they're safe, G-5 Marines get a surprise visit from Vice Admiral Vergo.

episodes.title: Hakunetsu no Gekisen: Luffy VS Caesar
episodes.plot: Luffy finally reaches Caesar and attacks him, while Smoker leaves in order to find Vergo.

episodes.title: Yami no Kuromaku! Doflamingo Ugoku!
episodes.plot: Law walks into the SAD room, Vergo speaks with Doflamingo about Law while Baby 5 attacks him.

episodes.title: Luffy Toushi!? Kyoufu no Yukionna Monet!
episodes.plot: Chopper uses Monster Point, trying to prevent the children from taking more candy. Luffy faces Monet and gets trapped but manages to make a hole in the floor and escape.

episodes.title: Butsukaru Kobushi! Futari no Chuujou no Tatakai
episodes.plot: Smoker and Vergo begin their fight in the SAD Room. At the same time, Sanji, Tashigi, and the G-5 Marines are running through the battle-torn B-block when a gas tank explodes, causing Shinokuni to get in.

episodes.title: Chiisana Dragon! Momonosuke Arawaru
episodes.plot: Luffy meets Momonosuke in the garbage dump of Block C. In a flashback, Momonosuke didn't want the candy Caesar gave out to the children and he got hungry so he ate a devil fruit which turned him into a dragon.

episodes.title: Fubuki no Shitou: Mugiwara no Ichimi Tai Yukionna
episodes.plot: Luffy and Momonosuke are still trying to get out of the garbage chute. Caesar is watching Monet fighting Zoro. Usopp, Brook and Kin'emon are trying to find the sea stone cuffs and Momonosuke.

episodes.title: Ougi Sakuretsu! Zoro Saikyou no Ittou-ryuu!
episodes.plot: Mocha is still running away with the candy, and the children are chasing her. Chopper, Nami, and Robin come to her and the children's aid. At the Biscuit Room, Zoro and Tashigi battle Monet.

episodes.title: Tomodachi o Mamoru! Mocha Inochi-gake no Tousou
episodes.plot: Luffy and Momonosuke manage to escape from the garbage chute and attack Caesar's subordinates, asking them where Caesar is. Mocha sacrifices herself and eats the candy.

episodes.title: Chahige Hitsuu! Luffy Ikari no Ichigeki
episodes.plot: Zoro carries Tashigi away from the poisonous gas. Sanji and the G-5 marines continue to assist Chopper to vaccinate the children.

episodes.title: Shougeki no Kecchaku! Smoker Tai Vergo!
episodes.plot: Smoker continues his fight with Vergo. The Straw Hat Pirates, G-5 Marines and the children run from the gas and continue to head towards building R-66. Usopp stumbles over the surveillance room where some of Caesar's men open fire at him.

episodes.title: Caesar Gekiha! Saikyou no Grizzly Magnum
episodes.plot: Vergo attempts to kill Law even though he is cut down. The Straw Hats continue their struggle to escape the poisonous gas.

episodes.title: Shuurai! Dressrosa kara no Shikaku
episodes.plot: Luffy defeats Caesar and sends him flying out of the facility. The Straw Hats, G-5, the children and Law made it to Building R-66 where they prepare to leave the building. Baby 5 and Buffalo attempt to rescue Caesar.

episodes.title: Ooabare! Muteki no Franky Shougun
episodes.plot: Franky begins to attack the two Donquixote pirates who retaliated with Baby 5 turning into weapons and Buffalo launching her at their robot foe.

episodes.title: Zettai Zetsumei! Punk Hazard Dai-Bakuhatsu
episodes.plot: The Straw Hats are still racing towards the exit of the collapsing lab when they felt the explosion of the SAD room and then saw Shinokuni on their trail.

episodes.title: Caesar o Hokaku-seyo - General Canon Sakuretsu
episodes.plot: General Franky puts up a good fight against Buffalo and Baby 5. He sends them flying away with a General Cannon, but the two refused to stay defeated despite their injuries.

episodes.title: Kandou no Saikai! Momonosuke to Kin'emon
episodes.plot: While the group celebrates their victory, Smoker talks with Law about him manipulating Luffy, but Law says that its the other way around.

episodes.title: Sekibetsu no Toki - Punk Hazard Shukkou!
episodes.plot: The Straw Hats and G-5 Marines part ways. Flying over the ocean, Doflamingo approaches a life raft with Baby 5 and Buffalo's heads hanging on it, which were apparently cut off by Law.

episodes.title: G-5 Kaimetsu! Doflamingo Kyuushuu!
episodes.plot: Caesar Clown's former minions go in a search for those who were petrified by Shinokuni. All a sudden, Doflamingo appears and kills majority of the G-5 Soldiers.

episodes.title: Kinpaku! Aokiji tai Doflamingo
episodes.plot: Doflamingo prepares to finish Smoker off, but is stopped by Kuzan's ice. At the Thousand Sunny, Law tells some details about the recently formed pirate alliance.

episodes.title: Kieta Caesar! Kaizoku Doumei Shutsugeki
episodes.plot: Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind - but while they fear Doflamingo's return and prepare to face him, another foe lies in wait, whose powers could be their downfall.
